data.eml:eml: Heteragrion denisye sp. nov. (Odonata: Zygoptera: Heteragrionidae), a notable species from Serra da Canastra, Minas Gerais, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vilela, Diogo Silva, Koroiva, Ricardo, Guillermo-Ferreira, Rhainer (2019): Heteragrion denisye sp. nov. (Odonata: Zygoptera: Heteragrionidae), a notable species from Serra da Canastra, Minas Gerais, Brazil. Zootaxa 4671 (4): 589-594, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4671.4.10
